name: CreateIncidentIntegration
description:
Create incident integration metadata for an incident.

Use this tool to create integration metadata related to a specific incident in Datadog. It facilitates linking external integrations to an incident for enhanced tracking and management.

parameters.name: incident_uuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the incident to create integration metadata for.

parameters.name: incident_integration_metadata
parameters.description: JSON payload containing incident integration metadata. Must include attributes like created, modified, integration_type, metadata, status, and type.

created.description: Timestamp when the incident todo was created.

incident_id.description: UUID of the incident this integration metadata is connected to.

integration_type.description:
A number indicating the type of integration this metadata is for. 1 indicates Slack;
8 indicates Jira.

modified.description: Timestamp when the incident todo was last modified.

attributes.description: Incident integration metadata's attributes for a create request.

data.description: Incident integration metadata data for a create request.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
